GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v5.10.122
GSD.description:
net: altera: Fix refcount leak in altera_tse_mdio_create

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit 96bf5ed057df2d157274d4e2079002f9a9404bb8, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit bbd2190ce96d8fce031f0526c1f970b68adc9d1a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: altera: Fix refcount leak in altera_tse_mdio_create
